LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_Kwama_QueenDamaged_Descr: Recent actions have threatened the {0} of this hive. Her cries of pain have been heard by her {1}, who have entered a manhunting rage. They will hunt down any humanoid they can reach, at least until the {0} has calmed.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_Kwama_NestCollapse_Descr: With the the death of this hives queen, her workers have entered a panicked state. They have begun to dig numerous tunnels, with little care for maintaining the stability of the surrounding area. Soon the entire nest will collapse in on itself.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_Kwama_AlertNestCollapse_: The kwama nest has become unstable, and will soon collapse in on itself.\n\nCollect any eggs you can and leave before it's too late.
